title: • Pi-Hole & balenaCloud
text: Kyle Harding created a setup to deploy a Pi-Hole stack using balenaCloud.

title: • Repetier server on balenaOS
text: Nick Neisen published a tutorial on deploying Repetier server to drive a CNC machine (or 3D printer) in Docker on balenaOS.

title: • Live temperature readings for TEMPer devices
text: Will Walker created a project to measure and display live temperature readings on a web page using TEMPer devices.

title: Write about your balena projects, get swag!
text: If you’ve built a project using any of our products, we’d love to hear about it! Write up what you’ve done on a site or in a blog post, then tweet us @balena_io with the #balenablog4swag hashtag and you could get a swag pack and hardware.
Feel free to give them a try and let the world know how you get on in the forums; the authors of these projects would love to know how you’re using them.
